name: Wabaa'
description:
Coronavirus is invading the world with millions of confirmed cases and thousands of reported deaths. Wabaa' (translates to Epidemic) is a puzzle game that raises the awareness about this virus, with facts about the disease, you play as the virus, you need to jump from host to host to infect all hosts in the game. 15 puzzles with abstract stories for each, in addition to facts about COVID-19 that gets unlocked when puzzles get solved.

#Stay_Home #Stay_Safe
